title: Bug 155238Trace should use System.identityHashCode, not hashCode
description: Bug 155238Trace should use System.identityHashCode, not hashCode The tracing module uses obj.hashCode() to identify untrusted objects when formatting. This way the tracing code wouldn't call any applicationdefined code, and would give a value that can't change if the loader state changes.
EB: I think it would be a little safer and more accurate to useSystem.identityHashCode(obj).
